1.content:
A tickling story that involves Ren and Stimpy.

Well you all know the classic Ren and Stimpy back from the 90's on Nickelodeon! And now they are back!

Ren was sitting in his room where they both slept, but he didn't know why. Ren has been feeling angry, especially at Stimpy for a while. Ren just laid on the bed trying to think happy thoughts when Stimpy came in the room. "Ren...are, are you okay?" Stimpy asked. "I was fine until you got here! Eediot!" Ren yelled. "I was only trying to make sure your okay." Stimpy said. "Yeah? Well I'm ok! Now get out of here!" Ren yelled. "I came to stay with you." Stimpy said. "Go watch your Muddy Mudskipper show or something." Ren said. "The show's over so I'm staying in here." Stimpy said. Ren growled. "You know, I've been wondering about this for a long time so um, I have wanted to ask you this. Are you ticklish?" Stimpy asked. Ren was nervous about this question. He had never been tickled before so he said, "No way man." "Really? Then would you be ticklish if you responded to this?" Stimpy asked. Ren knew what Stimpy was gonna do to him but it was too late to think about escaping.

Suddenly, Stimpy started tickling Ren's sides to his armpits to his stomach over and over again. "I'm not ticklish you eediot! Now let me go!" Ren yelled. "I'm not done tickling you yet, I'm just getting started!" Stimpy teased. Then he tickled Ren faster which made him laugh so hard! "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOOOOOO! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! STAHAP STOP IT! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Ren yelled. So Ren turned out to be ticklish which was unexpected! Stimpy thinks that this is a good way as revenge for Ren being so mean to him. Stimpy then tickled Ren in his bellybutton, another ticklish spot of his. Then Stimpy stopped tickling him and let him catch his breath. Stimpy came to the foot of the bed. "What are you doing?" Ren asked. "You'll see." Stimpy said. Then he stroked Ren's left foot with his finger. Ren giggled at the touch. Then Stimpy stroked his finger on both of Ren's feet. Ren laughed so hard. After that, Stimpy licked his tongue on his feet which tickled so much that he laughed like crazy! Then Stimpy came up to his belly and blew raspberries. He then tickled his thighs and the back of his knees. "Well Ren, I think you've had enough." Stimpy said. And with that, he stopped tickling him. Ren growled at him and grew angry for the heavy torture but then his smile grew. "I will get you Stimpy! After for what you did to me!" Ren yelled. Then he left the room. Stimpy wondered where he went so he looked for him.
1.title: Ren and Stimpy Tickling

choices: Ren and Stimpy continue to have their tickle fight

Ren and Stimpy have a weird dream about being tickled
11.content:
In the living room, Ren was sitting on the couch with rope. "Ah, Stimpy, what a surprise." Ren teased. "What are you doing Ren?" Stimpy asked. "I'm getting my revenge you eediot!" Ren said. He never tickled anybody before so he was trying to think of how Stimpy did it to him. Then Ren suddenly had an idea. "Stimpy, can you come over here for a minute." Ren said. Stimpy did as he was told and he sat on the couch next to him. Ren then tied him up with his rope. After that, he started tickling Stimpy's stomach. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Stimpy laughed. "Heh heh, gootchie gootchie goo!" Ren teased. And then he moved on to his bellybutton. Also he tickled his sides and his armpits. Ren tickled Stimpy everywhere for a good half an hour. "Hmm, I wonder if your feet are ticklish." Ren said. "No Ren! Not the feet!" Stimpy yelled. "Aw are your feet ticklish?" Ren teased. Then he started tickling Stimpy's feet with his fingers. Then he used his blue feather that he had with him all along. Stimpy just laughed so hard. After that, Ren licked Stimpy's sensitive, ticklish feet. He licked in between the toes and everywhere else! And he tickled Stimpy's feet until he saw that Stimpy passed out. "Well he'll probably tickle me back if he could when he wakes up." Ren said to himself.
And when Stimpy woke back up, he did tickle Ren back. Ren retaliated and tickled his beloved friend under the arms. They had a huge tickle fight until they passed out. It was a great ticklish day for both Ren and Stimpy!
11.title: Revenge!: Ren tickles Stimpy!

111.content:
So Ren and Stimpy continued to have their tickle fight when they woke up! And it looked like Ren is winning! Stimpy escaped and tickled Ren under the arm. Ren then escaped afterwards and tickled Stimpy on his stomach! Those two were having a blast as they collapsed on the floor laughing. "I wonder when Joy will be back." Stimpy said, panting. "She'll be back soon." Ren said. Suddenly, the phone rang. "I'll get it!" Stimpy yelled. He rushed to pick up the phone. "Hello? Oh hey Joy. How are ya? When are you coming back? Oh tomorrow. Ok that's exciting. Oh, Ren and I were just having a tickle fight. Ha ha ha, it was awesome. Oh, ok. You enjoy yourself now. Bye." Stimpy said as he hung up. "So when's Joy coming back?" Ren asked. "Tomorrow, she said that she is going to join our tickle fight! Isn't that exciting?!" Stimpy squealed, really excited. "Oh yeah, I'm real excited." Ren said sarcastically.



I wanted to add my made-up character for this show named Joy Paxter but she is actually away with her siblings and her parents, so it is just Ren and Stimpy at their house alone. If you don't know who Joy is, I will explain it to you.

Joy Paxter is the new owner of Ren and Stimpy and a new character to my own new show, The Ren, Stimpy and Joy Show (which is a now-called Children's show)! She is named after Stimpy's catchphrase and the Happy Happy Joy Joy Song! She is very stylish and loves to have teenage things and hang out with her friends. She is thirteen years old. She has a younger sister named Julia and a younger brother named Justice. Her best friends are Zoey, Hillary, Tiffany, and Courtney. She has a crush on a boy named Nick. This is who Joy is incase if you didn't know.
111.title: Ren and Stimpy continue to have their tickle fight

1111.content:
The next day, Joy Paxter was back with her siblings and parents. Ren and Stimpy were sleeping on her bed. "Ren, Stimpy, I'm back!" She yelled. Ren and Stimpy woke up to her voice and rushed downstairs. "Hey guys, guess what? I invited all my friends, even my boyfriend Nick to come to my own tickle party. And you guys are invited too." Joy whispered to them. She didn't want her parents or siblings to know anything about it. She had a plan to lure them all out. Joy told them that this awesome movie was coming out and was wondering if they wanted to see it. They said that they wanted to but asked why Joy isn't going. Joy said that she wanted to hang out with her friends at her house alone. Her parents were ok with that but she had to call incase of an emergency. And Joy had an awesome idea about cleaning up after the party ends.

"Hey guys, I lured my parents out. Now we can have a tickle party." Joy whispered. "Why do you always whisper?" Ren asked. "I don't want them hearing it." Joy said. When it was time, Joy's parents and siblings left to go see the movie.

Joy's friends, Zoey, Hillary, Tiffany and Courtney arrived with Nick, Joy's crush. "Guys, these are my pets, Ren and Stimpy." Joy said. "Hey cool pets." Nick said. "Um, nice to meet you." Zoey said. "Yeah," Hillary said. "Um, I don't know what to say Joy but they're kinda cool." Courtney said. "Awesome, let's party!!!! Yeah!" Joy yelled.
1111.title: My character Joy comes back!

11111.content:
And the awesome tickle party started! Joy and her friends (Hilary, Zoey, Tiffany and Courtney) were all tickling each other, even Nick, the handsome boy that Joy loves joined in. Ren and Stimpy shrugged their shoulders and started tickling each other.

This party lasted for a few hours until it got dark outside. Everybody passed out.

Joy's family came home and Joy woke up. She told all her friends to go up to her room to hide what they were all doing. What does Joy do now?
11111.title: The awesome tickle party starts!

111111.content:
"Nah, I won't tell them. I'll just keep it a secret." Joy decided. Her friends left from her bedroom window. Joy, Ren and Stimpy waved goodbye to them. The house wasn't too much of a mess, it was clean even if they had a tickle party!

Joy, Ren and Stimpy eventually went to sleep.
111111.title: Joy keeps it a secret

113.content:
Ren and Stimpy were both sound asleep after they have tickled each other. They both had the same, weird dream. They were actually in tickle hell. The Devil greeted them. "You boys have been very naughty." He said, "It's time for your punishment." So he pushed a red button. Ren and Stimpy were strapped in a table. "What is this?" Stimpy asked. Ren struggled to break free. "Let us go!" He yelled. The Devil pushed a button again. Feathers came flying out and it tickled Ren and Stimpy all over their bodies. They were laughing and screaming at the same time. The tickle torture went on for a few minutes until Ren and Stimpy both woke up!

They both screamed their heads off! "Wow, I just had the craziest dream." Ren said. "Yeah same here." Stimpy said.

"Well, that's all folks." Ren said.


THE END!
113.title: Ren and Stimpy have a weird dream about tickling

113111111111111112.content:
Pinky whimpered, his heart aching and his fuzzy little ears drooping.

Brain was always so busy, so distracted, so tormented by his own thoughts. He could never take a day off, or invest time in rest and relaxation. Whatever he did it was always to better others, even if the results never turned out that way.

He loved him so much, all he wanted was for him to be happy... and crying always made it worse, because he couldn't control his own emotions, and it made him feel so helpless, and unable to care for the one mouse who constantly protected him.

But most importantly, he never had time to play with him. All he wanted was for Brain to play with him for a little while. Spend some time with him, that didn't involve work...

His sad little sniffles got Brains attention and made him feel guilty (after he had bashed his head against the wall a couple of times. Caring for a friend displaying signs of aspergers, or bipolar or some kind of personality disorder at least was like raising a child. Hard work, and only worth it if you were careful and knew what you were doing.)

"Pinky..." Brain sighed exasperatedly, but returning to his side and gently squeezing his shoulder. "Stop crying. It's not the end of the world."

"Yes it is... You shouted at me..."
Pinky hid his face with his paws, hunched his shoulders and let his ears droop even lower. He curled his tail around himself sadly, shivering a little. This was one adorable trick he had learned to guilt trick Brain into coddling him a little.

Brain swallowed, trying not to give in, but his love and protective, nurturing, paternal side for Pinky swaying him.

"Pinky," he said gently, massaging his shoulders. "I spent a lot of time working on that machine. You don't understand the pressures, the difficult decisions I have to make for the future. Our future. Your future..." he added, softening from his own anxiety. "Our future together, our safety," he continued, placing a paw lovingly on top of his head.

Pinky rubbed his eyes tearfully, touched by Brains constant generosity of accepting him for who he was, and allowing him into his life. He smiled, and flushed when Brain protectively slinked his tail around Pinkys, and gave it a gentle tweak. Pinky tugged gently back, and they continued for a couple of seconds, until Pinkys smile was back.

"Oh Brain, you're making me feel all lovey dovey gushy inside," he blushed, squirming adorably.

Brain smiled patiently, but fondly at his very cute, but much dumber friend. He could wait a bit longer. He gave him a friendly tickle under his arms to give him a hint, that silly boy with his head in the clouds.

Pinky squealed then, giggles spilling out uncontrollably. It even made Brain chuckle a little bit. He could be a cute little thing when he wanted to be, not that he would ever admit it.

Then it hit him.

"Our future..." he seemed a little starstruck.

Brain smiled and nodded, flushing a little with pride himself, everytime Pinky said it.

"Our future..."

"That's right Pinky."

"Our future... OH.. Hold me Brain..."

Brain grinned, eyes dancing lovingly between Pinks beautiful blue ones. Oh god, how he longed to just.. pick him up and squeeze him right now but.. he couldn't. He had to maintain a certain level of authority.

"But, I have to fix my machine first," he hinted.

"Oh well we'd better go do that first!" Pinky cried jumping up excitedly. Anything so that he could be with Brain for the rest of his life!

"So much for wanting me to rest," he sighed. He took one look at the pieces of his machine, and felt his stomach drop. Suddenly he was too tired to start from scratch. Maybe he should spend one night resting with Pinky. Just one night.

Pinky was snuggling up to him, clinging onto him. He would have to hurt him if he didn't stop in a minute. Apart from the fact that he was being a bit too clingy and lovey dovey, his paws were dangerously close to his belly and ribs.

He did not particularly want to be the source of his lovers amusement in.. such an intense way.. so soon. He wasn't used to being held down and tickled, and Pinky was very over excitable sometimes. If he didn't stop...
113111111111111112.title: Guilt trick Brain into tickling Pinky
